game.suite

Class CheckersPawn

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.suite.CheckersPiece
      • game.suite.CheckersPawn

  • public class CheckersPawn
extends CheckersPiece
    Class that represents a normal Checkers piece that is not a king.

    • Constructor Summary

      CheckersPawn(int initX, int initY, CheckersBoard.Color color, CheckersStandardBoard board)
      Creates a new normal Checkers piece.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CheckersPawn

        public CheckersPawn(int initX,
                    int initY,
                    CheckersBoard.Color color,
                    CheckersStandardBoard board)
        Creates a new normal Checkers piece.
        Parameters:
        initX - the x location of the piece.
        initY - the y location of the piece.
        color - the color of the piece.
        board - the board that the piece belongs to.
